room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
room_address: 44325 W 12 Mile Ste H175 Novi, MI 48377
room_description: Inexhaustible fear overcomes you and your friends as you find yourself behind the locked door of The Cabin In The Woods. You all know the haunting tales of the great evil that occupies the very cabin that you're in. Soon, you realize that these tales aren't just fables, they're reality.
